sentences.en: a coat with a detachable hood
a jacket with a detachable hood
A limited edition, the car makes use of two aluminium detachable panels.
sentences.cn: 限量版, 这款车采用两种铝可拆卸顶板的使用.

sentences.en: Detachable antenna unit mounted away from the control unit.
sentences.cn: 感应天线与控制器机体拆分安装.

sentences.en: Detachable mechanism allows easy replacement without dismantling the dispenser.
sentences.cn: 拆卸机制允许简易拆换,而无需拆卸整个喷雾器.

sentences.en: Features removable, washable cover and detachable chew resistant cord.
sentences.cn: 以可移动, 耐洗的盖子和可拆的嚼抗性绳子为特色.

sentences.en: Feed Mechanism: 20 rounds detachable box mag.
sentences.cn: 饲料机制: 20发可拆卸框马格.

sentences.en: In the meantime, detachable slanting rotary wedge inserted may satisfy hardest requirements.
sentences.cn: 同时该机型中加入的可拆卸偏转楔可满足最苛刻的要求.

sentences.en: Look at this jacket. The sleeves are detachable.
sentences.cn: 你看这件夹克, 袖子是可以拆下来的.

sentences.en: The bag comes with detachable straps.
sentences.cn: 这种包有可拆卸的带子.

sentences.en: The coat has a detachable lining inside.
The coat has a detachable lining.
sentences.cn: 这件外套的衬里可拆卸。

sentences.en: The electric drive system is made detachable for ease of transportation and installation.
sentences.cn: 为了便于运输和安装,电力驱动系做成可以拆卸的.

sentences.en: The handle is detachable from the bag.
sentences.cn: 手柄可以从包上取下来.

sentences.en: The smile, too, seemed fastened there, detachable with the slightest tug.
sentences.cn: 她的笑容也似乎凝固在那儿, 需要轻微的来出来.

sentences.en: This fabric can be made into detachable collar linings.
sentences.cn: 这些布料可以用来做衬领.

words.tran_cn: 分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队
可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的

trans.tran_en: able to be removed and put back
